thread.title: BRIEF-Pacific Road Resources Funds To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Equinox Gold Corp

title: BRIEF-Pacific Road Resources Funds To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Equinox Gold Corp
text: March 2, 2018 / 8:59 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Pacific Road Resources Funds To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Equinox Gold Corp Reuters Staff March 2 (Reuters) - Pacific Road Resources Funds: * PRESS RELEASE - PACIFIC ROAD RESOURCES FUNDS ANNOUNCE INTENTION TO SELL COMMON SHARES OF EQUINOX GOLD * PACIFIC ROAD RESOURCES FUNDS SAYS ENTERED INTO ARRANGEMENTS TO SELL TOTAL OF 22 MILLION COMMON SHARES IN CAPITAL OF EQUINOX GOLD CORP * PACIFIC ROAD RESOURCES FUNDS SAYS THE EQUNIOX GOLD SHARES WILL BE SOLD AT C$1.15/SHARE, FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION TO THE FUND OF C$25.3 MILLION * PACIFIC ROAD RESOURCES FUNDS - DUE TO SALES OF EQUINOX GOLD SHARES, FUND WILL HOLD SHARES REPRESENTING ABOUT 5.1% OF EQUINOXâ€™S OUTSTANDING SHARES Source text for Eikon:
